name: projekt
description: A template project with npm build scripts
author: Luke Jackson

scripts.build: npm run index && npm run bundle
scripts.develop: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run store
scripts.index: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.html dist/index.html
scripts.bundle: browserify -t babelify -t hbsfy main.js -o dist/bundle.js -p [ parcelify -o dist/bundle.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify -t hbsfy main.js -o dist/bundle.js -p [ parcelify -wo dist/bundle.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
scripts.store: find dist/*.* -exec azure storage blob upload {} project {} \;
